data.eml:eml: New species of Drymopsalta Heath Cicadas (Cicadidae: Cicadettinae: Cicadettini) from Queensland and Northern Territory, Australia, with overview of genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ewart, A., Popple, L. W. (2013): New species of Drymopsalta Heath Cicadas (Cicadidae: Cicadettinae: Cicadettini) from Queensland and Northern Territory, Australia, with overview of genus. Zootaxa 3620 (1): 1-42, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3620.1.1
